channel.title: Bitcoin Core server i.p
channel.description: If one was to run bitcoin core on his server inside the bitcoin.conf file would I be better off binding it to 127.0.0.1 or would I use the stream isolation i.p?

item.title: Bitcoin Core server i.p
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
You are better off running it in its own separate workstation/gateway combo to avoid infection/exfiltration of your private keys.

Read full topic
